GiaArtigoStocksBDA derive(KeyCompany = "BDA") ~> AddKeyCompanyBDA
GiaArtigoStocksDS derive(KeyCompany = "DS") ~> AddKeyCompanyDS
GiaArtigoStocksMB derive(KeyCompany = "MB") ~> AddKeyCompanyMB
AddKeyCompanyBDA, AddKeyCompanyDS, AddKeyCompanyMB union(byName: true)~> UnionGiaArtigoStocks
LocalizacaoBDA derive(KeyCompany = "BDA") ~> AddKeyCompanyBDA2
LocalizacaoDS derive(KeyCompany = "DS") ~> AddKeyCompanyDS2
LocalizacaoMB derive(KeyCompany = "MB") ~> AddKeyCompanyMB2
UnionGiaArtigoStocks sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkGiaArtigoStocks
